mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.lesson_cnt AS "lessoncnt", a.livecourse_cnt AS "livecourseCnt", a.homework_cnt AS "homeworkCnt", a.lessontime AS "lessontime", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course( id, name, lesson_cnt, livecourse_cnt, homework_cnt, lessontime, version, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{lessoncnt}, #{livecourseCnt}, #{homeworkCnt}, #{lessontime}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE course
name = #{name},
lesson_cnt = lesson_cnt + #{lessoncnt},
livecourse_cnt = livecourse_cnt + #{livecourseCnt},
homework_cnt = homework_cnt + #{homeworkCnt},
lessontime = #{lessontime},
update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}
WHERE id = #{id}
